text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
――Actually, I haven't eaten anything 
Christmas-ish, have I? Maybe I should buy some 
salad or something.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
…You don't say meat or fries 
at times like this, do you?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Huh? …Oh, okay. You want to eat, don't you? But 
you're not a character so it's hard to say? Pfft.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
H-Huh?! That's not it! Why are you so…? …Can't 
you be honest without that outfit?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Aaah! Y-You idiot! Didn't we promise 
to have amnesia together!? If you're 
going to say that, you—

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
She's completely back to her old self. Well, I 
figured she'd do that if I left her alone.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …What happened to her?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Laurel? She seems to be looking at the tree a 
little more. …Oh, right, me too…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …? You want to take a picture?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I need to report the results to Pres. I 
want her to know that it was a huge success.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Then lend it to me. Wouldn't she 
be happier with you around?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Why am I staring at you like that? What 
kind of face do you want me to make? I haven't 
even fixed my makeup…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Okay, enough… There's a photo booth over there, 
right? Let's go.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
――Wait, hold on a second……I might have gone too 
far. I'm not trying to show you――

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Shut up. …I'll take a picture.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Ah!
(*click*)

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure she'll be a little impatient now. 'Even 
without you, I can handle this well'……that's 
what you should say.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
No, I'm not going to go that far… Well, 
I guess the president will be happy 
to know that you helped out.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
…Hm? Wait, now that I think about it, why are 
you on the other side? You're off balance. I'm 
on top. Let's go back and try again.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Laurel was still near the tower.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Oh, you're running away!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I need to do something. Also……I didn't lick you. 
You're so annoying……that's all.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …Geez. Are you in puberty…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: …It's beautiful.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Hey, Brian.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …You'll catch a cold. Your body must be weak.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
It's okay now. More importantly, Haron 
Tower… I'm sure a lot of people are 
looking up at this light.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure this is what it means to be the light 
that you aim for, even higher than anyone else.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
How roundabout. What are you trying to say? 
…What do you want to do?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: ――I wanted to light a fire for you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
It's true that I'm physically weak. That's why… 
I'm way later than everyone else.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
I gritted my teeth and watched you do your best. 
After that, the fire weakened…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
But I'm finally ready to fight. That's why I've 
been waiting for the time to 'swear' to you.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Like Vodka and Scarlet, I couldn't cheer you up 
by always being by your side.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
But… there's still something I can do. Just as 
cherry blossoms bloom and scatter… If the end 
comes to everything…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
――I'll be the one to repaint your 
light! I'll shine brighter than you, 
and advance into the future!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Ha. So you came to finish me off.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! But you know, I'm not talking about the 
current Naritablyan, right? I want to finish you 
off with a fierce, gleaming you…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: So, how was it? Did you get fired up?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
…If you want to know, come to the race. I'll 
just run. …Until I stop breathing.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Wait for me.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
(I can't see your back in the Christmas 
crowd. It's always been like this. 
I've just been watching…)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
(But… I made eye contact with you 
today. I saw a faint fire flicker 
in her eyes as she looked at me.)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
(I can't be that kind of opponent…… I can't. If 
I'm going to freeze in the cold, I should at 
least…… give up.)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
(And once Christmas is over, the time for the 
flowers to bloom will be near.)
